name: jerusalemhills-marketplace
description: Jerusalem Hills Marketplace with Stripe Checkout

scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:js: terser js/analytics.js -o js/analytics.min.js --compress --mangle && terser js/adsense-config.js -o js/adsense-config.min.js --compress --mangle && terser js/accessibility-enhancements.js -o js/accessibility-enhancements.min.js --compress --mangle && terser js/mobile-touch-controls.js -o js/mobile-touch-controls.min.js --compress --mangle && terser js/main.js -o js/main.min.js --compress --mangle && terser kids/assets/js/sound-manager.js -o kids/assets/js/sound-manager.min.js --compress --mangle && terser kids/assets/js/enhanced-sound-system.js -o kids/assets/js/enhanced-sound-system.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o styles.min.css styles.css && cleancss -o styles-new.min.css styles-new.css && cleancss -o kids/assets/css/kids.min.css kids/assets/css/kids.css && cleancss -o kids/assets/css/game.min.css kids/assets/css/game.css

author: Jerusalem Hills
